definition: to follow closely behind sb or sth (idiom)

sentences.english: The roads and aqueducts of Rome have been the admiration of all after ages.
sentences.chinese: 古羅馬的大道和高架渠在其後的年代一直受到羨慕。

sentences.english: We may just be following Mother Nature's ancient recipe.
sentences.chinese: 我們可能正走在大自然曾走過的老路，步其後塵。

sentences.english: It's kind of like a little wall of straw that you hide behind.
sentences.chinese: 就是用稻草堆起來的一堵小牆，人躲在其後。

sentences.english: Not far behind him was Lin Tao.
I still had to continue my uphill walk after taking the pictures to find the bus stop to take me back to Tsuen Wan.
sentences.chinese: 其後還要繼續步行到下一個巴士站才乘巴士回到荃灣。

sentences.english: The Fearless Hyena, pictured here, was made shortly after in 1979.
sentences.chinese: 圖中所示影片《笑拳怪招》於其後的1979年拍攝。

sentences.english: One car made a sudden stop and the car behind it pilled up.
sentences.chinese: 由於前面的車急停車，緊隨其後的車撞了上去。

sentences.english: He was then taken to the Allegheny County Jail.
sentences.chinese: 其後他被送到阿利根尼縣入獄。

sentences.english: Now, as much as I can, I follow in his footsteps.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我盡我所能步其後塵而來。

sentences.english: A hatchback and a SUV will quickly follow.
sentences.chinese: 緊隨其後，一款兩廂車和SUV車型將面市。

sentences.english: her mother died and her father followed.
sentences.chinese: 母親辭世後不久，父親也緊隨其後，悄然離去。

sentences.english: The distribution of optical field passing through lens array is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 結合列陣透鏡的透過率分析了其後的光場分佈。

sentences.english: The littlest knight followed on his pony.
sentences.chinese: 小小騎士乘着馬駒緊隨其後。

sentences.english: Then, penman analyze the actuality of Chinese government scale by demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 其後，筆者實證地分析了中國政府規模的現狀。

sentences.english: The place formerly known as Town Huduo, and later called Jianhu County.
sentences.chinese: 這個處所過去叫湖垛鎮，其後叫建湖縣。

sentences.english: It must be followed by the function name and the parenthesized list of formal parameters.
sentences.chinese: 其後必須帶有函數名和以括號標明的參數列表。

definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
in a little while/in a moment/later on
to part or leave each other/to distinguish/difference/in different ways/differently/separately or individually
surname Jin/the Jin Dynasties (265-420)/Western Jin 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316), Eastern Jin 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420) and Later Jin Dynasty (936-946)/short name for Shanxi province 山西[Shan1 xi1]
